title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI tool to pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in REST API server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API; install from PyPI as ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) exposing Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Lightweight Node.js CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick prompts from the shell.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Collection of VS Code & JetBrains plugins that wire Ollama models into editor copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat (React component)
summary: Reusable React component that provides a ChatGPT-like chat interface backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that builds Ollama and common models reproducibly on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and streaming completions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that brings Ollama models into Discord channels with conversation memory.
